definition: the Yellow Emperor, mythological emperor of China, reigned c. 2697-2597 BC
The Yellow Emperor's Internal Canon, medical text c. 300 BC
The Yellow Emperor's Classic of Eighty-one Difficulties, medical text, c. 1st century AD
pinyin: Huang2 di4 Ba1 shi2 yi1 Nan4 jing1

sentences.english: As early as the "Huang Di Nei Jing" there are records.
sentences.chinese: 早在《黃帝內經》就有記載。

sentences.english: Huangdi was later regarded in Chinese mythology as the forefather of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 在後來的中國神話中，黃帝被尊爲華夏之祖。

sentences.english: It had been nineteen years since Yellow Emperor unified the country.
sentences.chinese: 黃帝一統天下已經十九年了。

sentences.english: Chicheng ancient tribal Jinyun for the Yellow Emperor's way.
sentences.chinese: 赤城古爲黃帝部族縉雲氏地。

sentences.english: The company will be regarded as the rule of Huangdi future generations, peace and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 這一吉兆被視爲黃帝之統治將千秋萬代，和平繁榮。

sentences.english: Huangdi Neijing (Huangdi's Classic on Medicine )laid the foundation for formation of the Tuinaology system.
sentences.chinese: 《黃帝內經》爲按摩醫學體系白勺形成奠定了基礎。

sentences.english: Lastly, it simply analyzed the reason why Taoism should choose Laozi as the founder instead of King Huang.
sentences.chinese: 最後討論了道教放棄黃帝而選擇老子作爲教主的原因。

sentences.english: The second section examines the concept "spirit" in the Huangdi Neijing.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分爲《黃帝內經》中“神”範疇的研究。

sentences.english: Men of the world, such as sitting in the Yellow Emperor.
sentences.chinese: 男人可以管天下，就如坐朝的黃帝。

sentences.english: Legends say that the Emperor Huangdi invented the calendar in 2637 BC.
sentences.chinese: 傳說黃帝在公元前2637年發明了這套曆法。

sentences.english: Why do Chinese people hold memorial ceremonies for them every year?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼中國人對黃帝聲勢浩大的祭典歷久不衰？

sentences.english: For example, once the records, said the "yellow emperor war muddy porridge".
sentences.chinese: 比如，曾經有記載，說黃帝戰爭了“渾粥”。

sentences.english: Chinese medicine method and theory spring from Huangdi Emperor's Internal Classic.
sentences.chinese: 中醫的方法與理論淵源於《黃帝內經》。

sentences.english: The main activities of Huangdi were in the North, which was related to the battles against Hunzhou and Chiyou.
sentences.chinese: 黃帝主要活動在北方，與抗葷粥和戰蚩尤有關。

sentences.english: Yuan temple's main hall Yellow Emperor placed among the memorial tablets.
sentences.chinese: 軒轅廟內的大殿中間放有黃帝的牌位。

sentences.english: This proves that the Yellow Emperor Family Home "Yellow River" downstream.
sentences.chinese: 這證明黃帝族居“黃河”下游。

definition: The Yellow Emperor's Internal Canon, medical text c. 300 BC
Shennong or Farmer God (c. 2000 BC), first of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] and creator of agriculture
Records of the Grand Historian, by 司馬遷|司马迁[Si1 ma3 Qian1], first of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]

feudal vassal/feudal princes, esp. the monarchs (dukes or princes) of the several vassal states 諸侯國|诸侯国 of Zhou during Western Zhou and Spring and Autumn periods 11th-5th century BC/subordinate warlord/local official
to pass on/to hand down/tradition has it that .../according to legend
Sima Qian (145-86 BC), Han Dynasty historian, author of Records of the Grand Historian 史記|史记[Shi3 ji4], known as the father of Chinese historiography
Zuo Zhuan or Tsochuan, Mr Zuo's Annals or Mr Zuo's commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history c. 400 BC attributed to famous blind historian Zuo Qiuming 左丘明[Zuo3 Qiu1 ming2]
Classic of Mountain and Sea, probably compiled c. 500 BC-200 BC, contains wide range of geography, mythology, witchcraft, popular customs etc
